#id=1
#text=Two days ago , it was Earth Day .
#id=2
#text=A few people were giving out seeds in order to project the idea of green living into people 's minds .
#id=3
#text=My friend and I , Joey , decided that we would help to plant a few trees in order to contribute to the efforts .
#id=4
#text=We received a few tree saplings in the mail from a catalog .
#id=5
#text=Joey and I decided that we would plant them in our backyard to provide shade .
#id=6
#text=While the trees might be small now , hopefully they would grow into big trees for maybe our kids .
#id=7
#text=We got all down and dirty in the grass , starting to rake up a circle of grass in order to turn over some topsoil .
#id=8
#text=We had a trowel , and yes we called it a trowel , and we dug into the dirt to start planting the tree .
#id=9
#text=We made a six inch deep hole in the soil , and then put the tree in .
#text=We finished by packing the soil down around the roots of the small tree , and then we watered it .
